mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card( pointId, language, area, questionType, difficultyLevel, titleText, titleVoiceSrc, titleAutoPlay, questionText, questionVoiceSrc, questionAutoPlay, questionImages, answers, createTime, createId )VALUES( #{pointId}, #{language}, #{area}, #{questionType}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{titleText}, #{titleVoiceSrc}, #{titleAutoPlay}, #{questionText}, #{questionVoiceSrc}, #{questionAutoPlay}, #{questionImages}, #{answers}, #{createTime}, #{createId} )
mapper.select: select t.id,t.pointId ,b.pointName ,t.questionType, t.difficultyLevel,t.titleText,t.questionText,t.questionImages,t.answers from card t ,point b where t.pointId=b.id and t.id=#{id}
select t.id,t.pointId ,b.pointName ,t.questionType, t.difficultyLevel,t.titleText,t.questionText,t.questionImages,t.answers from card t ,point b where t.pointId=b.id and t.pointId=#{pointId}
mapper.update: UPDATE card set language=#{language}, area=#{area}, questionType=#{questionType}, difficultyLevel=#{difficultyLevel}, titleText=#{titleText}, titleVoiceSrc=#{titleVoiceSrc}, titleAutoPlay=#{titleAutoPlay}, questionText=#{questionText}, questionVoiceSrc=#{questionVoiceSrc}, questionAutoPlay=#{questionAutoPlay}, questionImages=#{questionImages}, answers=#{answers}, isOpen=#{isOpen}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateId=#{updateId} where id=#{id}
UPDATE point t set t.number=t.number+1 WHERE t.id=#{id}
UPDATE point t ,card b set t.number=t.number-1 WHERE b.id=#{id} AND t.id =b.pointId
